Translations.Text: Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho naksatraraajira astacalara
arau niscaya e'ito eta mahasapata, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
niscaya e'ito mahimanbita kora'ana
yito ache suraksita kitabata (lipibad'dha)
Paraitrasakalara bahirae ana konorae iyaka sparsa karaiba noraarae
E'ito srstijagatara pratipalakara paraa aratirna
Tathapi'o tomaloke e'i banika tuccha buli bhabicha neki
arau tomaloke asbikara karaake'i tomalokara jiraika karai laicha
eteke kiya nahaya—praana yetiya kanthagata haya
arau tetiya tomaloke (asahaya hai) ca'i thaka
arau ami tomalokatakai'o tara bechi ocarata thako, kintu tomaloke dekha noporaa
Eteke yadi tomaloke hicapa-nikaca arau pratiphalara sanmukhina nohoraa
teneha'le tomaloke se'ito (atmato) ghuraa'i nana kiya? Yadi tomaloke satyabadi
tara pichata si yadi naikatyapraaptasakalara ejana haya
tente tara babe thakiba bisraama, uttama jiranopakarana arau sukhamaya jannata
Arau si yadi haya somphalara dalara ejana
tente (taka koraa ha’ba) ‘tomara prati chalama’, yihetu tumi somphalara ejana
Kintu si yadi haya asbikarakarai, bibhraantasakalara ejana
tente tara atithya karaa ha’ba utala panira dbaraa
arau jahannamara dahanerae
niscaya e'ito suniscita satya
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
